PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Name_LangKey: Language Key for the name of the object
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Value_NAME_OF_: Value of a specific field. 'NAME_OF_FIELD' must be replaced with the actual name of the field. The name is not case-sensitive.

Start of the content that will only be rendered if a certain field equals a certain value. 'NAME_OF_FIELD' must be replaced with the actual name of the field. The name is not case-sensitive. 'VALUE_TO_COMPARE' must be replaced with the compare value.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Value_Equals_E: End of the content that will only be rendered if a certain field equals a certain value.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Value_NAME_OF_: Start of the content that will only be rendered if a certain field does not equal a certain value. 'NAME_OF_FIELD' must be replaced with the actual name of the field. The name is not case-sensitive. 'VALUE_TO_COMPARE' must be replaced with the compare value.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Value_NotEqual: End of the content that will only be rendered if a certain field does not equal a certain value.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_LangKey_NAME_O: Language key for the value of a specific field. 'NAME_OF_FIELD' must be replaced with the actual name of the field. The name is not case-sensitive.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_HasField_NAME_: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the current object owns a certain field. 'NAME_OF_FIELD' must be replaced with the actual name of the field. The name is not case-sensitive.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_HasField_End: End of the content that will only be rendered if the current object owns a certain field.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_NotHasField_NA: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the current object does not own a certain field. 'NAME_OF_FIELD' must be replaced with the actual name of the field. The name is not case-sensitive.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_NotHasField_En: End of the content that will only be rendered if the current object does not own a certain field.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_FieldIsBlank_N: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the current object does not own a certain field or if the field is blank. 'NAME_OF_FIELD' must be replaced with the actual name of the field. The name is not case-sensitive.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_FieldIsBlank_E: End of the content that will only be rendered if the current object does not own a certain field or if the field is blank.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_FieldIsNotBlan: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the current object owns a certain field and if the field is not blank. 'NAME_OF_FIELD' must be replaced with the actual name of the field. The name is not case-sensitive.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the current object owns a certain field and if the field is not blank.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Field_List_Sta: Start of the attribute list. Will be replaced by the unused fields oder all fields placeholder when beeing integrated into an object.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Field_List_End: End of the attribute list. Will be replaced by the unused fields oder all fields placeholder when beeing integrated into an object.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_UnusedFields: List of unused flex field values. The attribute list template will be used for this and the start and end placeholders will be replaced with the unused fields placeholders.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_HasUnusedField: Start of the content that will only be rendered if there are unused fields. Non used fields are all fields that were not referenced by name.
End of the content that will only be rendered if there are unused fields.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_UnusedFields_S: Start of the list of unused fields. Non used fields are all fields that were not referenced by name.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_UnusedFields_E: End of the list of unused fields.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_AllFields: List of all flex field values. The attribute list template will be used for this and the start and end placeholders will be replaced with the all fields placeholders.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_AllFields_Star: Start of the list of all fields
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_AllFields_End: End of the list of all fields
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Field_Value_Eq: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the current field equals a certain value. 'VALUE_TO_COMPARE' must be replaced with the compare value.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the current field equals a certain value.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Field_Value_No: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the current field does not equal a certain value. 'VALUE_TO_COMPARE' must be replaced with the compare value.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the current field does not equal a certain value.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Field_LangKey: Language key for the value of the field. Used if you want to use localization instead of hard coding a string value.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Field_IsNumber: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the current field is a number field. Must be closed with FlexField_Field_IsNumberField_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the current field is a number field.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Field_IsString: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the current field is a text field. Must be closed with FlexField_Field_IsStringField_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the current field is a text field.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Field_IsBlank_: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the current field is blank. Must be closed with FlexField_Field_IsBlank_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the current field is blank.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Field_IsNotBla: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the current field is not blank. Must be closed with FlexField_Field_IsNotBlank_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the current field is not blank.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Field_IsFirst_: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the current field is the first. Must be closed with FlexField_Field_IsFirst_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the current field is the first.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Field_IsNotFir: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the current field is not the first. Must be closed with FlexField_Field_IsNotFirst_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the current field is not the first.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Field_IsLast_S: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the current field is the last. Must be closed with FlexField_Field_IsLast_End.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Field_IsLast_E: End of the content that will only be rendered if the current field is the last.
PlaceholderDesc_FlexField_Field_IsNotLas: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the current field is not the last. Must be closed with FlexField_Field_IsNotLast_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the current field is not the last.
